pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analysis of Large-Scale Toxico-Genomic Data // Contains a set of functions to perform large-scale analysis of toxicogenomic data. A member of the Benjamin Haibe-Kains (BHK) lab's genomics (Gx) suite of software, this package provides a standardized data structure to hold information relevant to annotation, visualization and statistical analysis of toxico-genomic data. This package is in early release, and more features will be added over the next few months. For more information please see the included documentation, vignette, as well as: Ruede-Zarate, H.A. et al (2017) doi:10.1371/journal.pone.0176284, Caiment, F. et al (2014) doi:10.1093/carcin/bgt278.
